content.html: Good reminder: Don't start chat conversations with a sole "Hello" or "Hi" and then nothing. If you feel the need (which you shouldn't) preface your entire message with it. "Hi, what time is the meeting?" Great website: nohello.net
content.value:
Good reminder: Don't start chat conversations with a sole "Hello" or "Hi" and then nothing. 

If you feel the need (which you shouldn't) preface your entire message with it. "Hi, what time is the meeting?"

Great website: nohello.net
